alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 5:36AM AKST until December 29 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow, rain, freezing rain, blowing snow and strong winds occuring. Travel will be very difficult. Damage to power lines is possible. Additional snow accumulations 1 inch, and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch, are expected. Wind gusting to 40 mph and visibility less than one half mile at times is expected. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 9 AM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and freezing rain will occur today. Southwest winds gusting to 40 mph will cause blowing snow with low visibility. Conditions will improve later this morning as winds decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
